title: Best of The Herd for Jun 12, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Jun 12, 2020
description:
The NFL is doing a great job of fixing things involving social justice and next is Colin Kaepernick

Alabama's history suggest Tua won't be great in the NFL

This unusual off-season is great for the Chiefs and really bad for the Cowboys


Guests: Ric Bucher, Fox Sports NBA Analyst

Andy Reid, Chiefs Head Coach
